resp = client.indices.create(
    index="example_points",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "location": {
                "type": "geo_point"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="example_points",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "name": "Wind & Wetter, Berlin, Germany",
        "location": [
            13.400544,
            52.530286
        ]
    },
)
print(resp1)
